name: Cannon Restaurant
description:
Hi! This is my first project and it was designed for Mini Jam 38.

The topic is "Food" and limitation is "only use the arrow keys as input".

So, this game only accepts Arrow inputs for each direction.

Story:

You're a manager with a sadistic approach to service. You use a Cannon instead of a waiter! to serve their food faster! I wonder how long you keep them happy...

Information:

- Right Arrow (On Menu): Play game.

- Arrows (In Game): Throws the current product on pipe-cannon to the person.

Game Rules:

- You have 100 happiness (health) at the beginning.

- You will lose 2 happiness in each game second.

- You will gain 4 happiness for each correct serving.

- You will lose 5 happiness for each incorrect serving.

- You will gain 1 point for each correct serving and multiplies by the current score up to x6.

- Game speed increases by point up to x3

Enjoy!
